snippet.title: Conglomerate 451: Overloaded  - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Conglomerate 451: Overloaded is a grid-based, dungeon-crawling first-person RPG with roguelike elements set in a cyberpunk world. The game is based on combat and exploration, with turn-based battles settled in the same scene. The strategic supervision of the Team and the Headquarters are key to overcoming the opponents.

The player is the CEO of a Special Agency, instructed by the Senate of Conglomerate City to restore the order in sector 451, where corrupted corporations have established their turf. During this quest, the player will have to build a team, manipulate DNA, train agents, equip them with high-end weapons, choose what cyber limbs to implant, and send the squad to the field with only one goal: eradicate crime and restore order at any cost. Conglomerate 451: Overloaded also features a Story and an Endless Mode for limitless fun.

Managing carefully the resources, augmenting bodies with interchangeable cyber implants, and exploring procedural cyber dungeons are just a part of this futuristic quest.
